tns:patch.author: Alexandru Artimon
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_mode_of_payment AS SELECT a.amp_activity_id, COALESCE(val.category_value, 'Mode of Payment Unallocated'::character varying(255)) AS mode_of_payment_name, COALESCE(val.id, (0)::bigint) AS mode_of_payment_code FROM (amp_funding fund LEFT JOIN amp_category_value val ON ((val.id = fund.mode_of_payment_category_va))), amp_activity_version a WHERE (fund.amp_activity_id = a.amp_activity_id) GROUP BY a.amp_activity_id, val.id, val.category_value ORDER BY a.amp_activity_id, val.category_value;;;
